summary: This bill, the Safety and Opportunity for Girls Act of 2025, aims to clarify protections related to sex and sex-segregated spaces under Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972. It defines 'female,' 'male,' 'sex,' and 'sex-segregated.' The bill specifies that Title IX should not be interpreted to prevent educational institutions from maintaining sex-segregated spaces like bathrooms and locker rooms, or athletic and academic programs.
